thread.title_full: Amazing - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DMier
title: Amazing
text:
From the minute I arrived at the Beekman, the service was exceptional. The hotel is beautiful with a very rich history that is worth exploring. Everyone I came in contact with was extremely knowledgeable and willing to share. The art is also worth taking the time to learn about. The concierge provided a book on the hotel, the restoration, and the decoartion. It was a nice addition to the staff input. The room was spacious (especially for New York) with luxurious appointments. I truly do not have a bad thing to say about my stay.
A special thank you to Joe in security who made sure the earrings I forgot in the room were returned to me quickly via fedex. Another show of great customer service.
